horace, antiquan blacksmith.description: A rough, scarred man. He is focused intently on his work, but he sends you a quick glance as you look over at him.
horace, antiquan blacksmith.response: If you're looking for armor or weapons, I can't sell them to you here, these are for city guards only. If you're looking to smith however, I'd be more than happy to let you use the facilities here and I can sell you the tools to get you started.
